title: Design-Based Research Workshop for Literary Education Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical workshop for pre-service teachers or literature education enthusiasts, emphasizing reflective practice and collaborative learning to strengthen instructional design skills

learning_goals: Three or more strategies can be proposed for utilizing learners' everyday interpretive activities in literature education design.
Activities for building a trust-based learning community can be integrated into a reflective practice process.
A methodology for constructing literary interpretations using emotional evaluation can be applied to actual class cases.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
